item.content:encoded: The great Nelson Mandela was freed from a South African prison 35 years ago today. Far right extremists are once again determined to turn back the clock here in America and throughout the world. We will never abandon the long walk toward freedom.

item.content:encoded: Surprisingly, ignoring worries can improve mental health. Evidence: After practice blocking out fears, people were less anxious‚Äîand less depressed 3 months later‚Äîespecially if they had high anxiety or PTSD. Not all concerns demand attention. Some thoughts are worth dismissing.

BREAKING: In response to our motion, the court has required CDC, FDA, and HHS to immediately restore critical health info and data that the Trump administration ordered the agencies to remove.
This is a huge win for doctors, researchers, and patients.

item.content:encoded: Since big tech unusually gave quantitative and qualitative guidance on capex, can look at Y/Y change by quarter since ChatGPT was released. Was actually negative in early 2023, surged through 2024 and likely peaked in Q4, will be low teens by Q4 2025 if you believe guidance.
